content: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=77367245 is a draft of the page for moderated announcements
@Anne Wizauer are you able to set up a "@HL7 Moderator" account on chat.fhir.org with some kind of HL7 staff email account behind it?
Should be me, I think. Or I should be consulted in cases of doubt. at least

We initially agreed on the idea that hl7 staff would triage, and any requests that were not obviously okay will be brought up here for discussion. This means the request would go through a role-based account, so it wouldn't be blocked when individuals are away on vacation etc. Grahame, if you would prefer to update the document to say just contact Grahame with all requests, I'm certainly fine with that. We just didn't want overload you.
